title: Pictionary
overview: Based on Mattel's popular board game of quick-fire sketches and hilarious guesses, Pictionary will follow the same rules as the familiar at-home game and will see two teams battle against each other. In the classic sketching and guessing game Mel Giedroyc will be joined by two celebrity team captains who will lead their teams of contestants. Their mission is to draw images to match a word or phrase from a specific category and the teammates will have to guess correctly to score. The show proves you don't have to be an artist to draw and in fact, if you can't draw, it makes it even funnier! With the chance to win an incredible prize, the stakes are high…
